description: This source file defines Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes related to Partner operations, including create, update, and response DTOs, used for web request/response handling within the invoice backend project.

classes.name: PartnerDtos.PartnerCreateRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new partner, with validation and schema annotations

classes.name: PartnerDtos.PartnerResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning partner information in responses
